parameters.name: DomainName
parameters.description: The ID of the Domain Name System (DNS) record. You can call the [DescribeDomainRecords](https://www.alibabacloud.com/help/zh/dns/api-alidns-2015-01-09-describedomainrecords?spm=a2c63.p38356.help-menu-search-29697.d\_0) operation to obtain the ID.

parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
The language of the content within the request and response. Default value: **zh**. Valid values:

*   **zh**: Chinese
*   **en**: English

parameters.name: Type
parameters.description:
The feature verified by using the TXT record. Valid values:

*   ADD_SUB_DOMAIN: add a subdomain for verification.
*   RETRIEVAL: add other subdomains for verification
